rev.desc.rev.desc: ChM Process Designer: change.task.link in cm3tcatphase is ignored at task open
Task category's "Assigned number before Commit" should only works for forground taks creation.
Set $L.exit correctly after call doc engine

QCRQ1E65843: Task4: Move the RAD applications modified by the PD team from Perforce to SVN QC Ref. QCCR68452 - Fix for Back button not being in proper format wnen a New Task is opened. When back button is clicked, it gives RAD errors. QC Ref. QCCR69516 - Open New Task option is not available on all workflow phases [PS Labs Issues #7515/7518] QC Ref. QCCR69516 - Open New Task option is not available on all workflow phases [PS Labs Issues #7515/7518] QC Ref. QCCR1E70141 - Auto open tasks in the background (such as after an auto transition caused by an approval) were not firing. Panel: call.save Change: New se.view.engine panel Panel: check.bg Change: New decision panel Panel: check.passed.category Change: Added a new exit to the "exit.normal" panel Panel: copy.task.fields Change: Changed the exit from "exit.normal" to "check.bg" Panel: display.parents Change: Changed the exit from "exit.normal" to "exit.menu" Changed the exit from "exit.normal" to "exit.cancel" Panel: get.category Change: Changed the exit from "exit.none" to "no.category.msg" Panel: no.category.msg Change: New message panel Panel: parameter Change: Added a new "Background" parameter Panel: process.category Change: Changed the following expression from: if (avail.cond in $L.category=NULL or evaluate(avail.cond in $L.category) and (lng(denull(request.phases in $L.category))=0 or index(name in $L.parent.phase, requezst.phases in $L.category)>0)) then ($L.allowed.cats=insert($L.allowed.cats, 0, 1, name in $L.category)) else ($L.all.cats=false) To: if (avail.cond in $L.category=NULL or evaluate(avail.cond in $L.category) and (lng(denull(request.phases in $L.category))=0 or index(name in $L.parent.phase, request.phases in $L.category)>0)) then ($L.allowed.cats=insert($L.allowed.cats, 0, 1, name in $L.category)) else ($L.all.cats=false) Panel: setup.category.sql Change: Changed the following expression from: if (not $L.all.cats) then ($L.cat.sql="name isin "+str($L.allowed.cats)) To: $L.all.cats=nullsub($L.all.cats, false) if (not nullsub($L.all.cats, false)) then ($L.cat.sql="name isin "+str(nullsub($L.allowed.cats, "{}"))) Panel: start Change: Added the following expression: $L.no.category.msg=scmsg(364, "cm3") $L.bg=nullsub($INTO.BG, false)

descript.descript: ChM Process Designer: change.task.link in cm3tcatphase is ignored at task open
Task category's "Assigned number before Commit" should only works for forground taks creation.
Set $L.exit correctly after call doc engine

QCRQ1E65843: Task4: Move the RAD applications modified by the PD team from Perforce to SVN QC Ref. QCCR68452 - Fix for Back button not being in proper format wnen a New Task is opened. When back button is clicked, it gives RAD errors. QC Ref. QCCR69516 - Open New Task option is not available on all workflow phases [PS Labs Issues #7515/7518] QC Ref. QCCR69516 - Open New Task option is not available on all workflow phases [PS Labs Issues #7515/7518] QC Ref. QCCR1E70141 - Auto open tasks in the background (such as after an auto transition caused by an approval) were not firing. Panel: call.save Change: New se.view.engine panel Panel: check.bg Change: New decision panel Panel: check.passed.category Change: Added a new exit to the "exit.normal" panel Panel: copy.task.fields Change: Changed the exit from "exit.normal" to "check.bg" Panel: display.parents Change: Changed the exit from "exit.normal" to "exit.menu" Changed the exit from "exit.normal" to "exit.cancel" Panel: get.category Change: Changed the exit from "exit.none" to "no.category.msg" Panel: no.category.msg Change: New message panel Panel: parameter Change: Added a new "Background" parameter Panel: process.category Change: Changed the following expression from: if (avail.cond in $L.category=NULL or evaluate(avail.cond in $L.category) and (lng(denull(request.phases in $L.category))=0 or index(name in $L.parent.phase, requezst.phases in $L.category)>0)) then ($L.allowed.cats=insert($L.allowed.cats, 0, 1, name in $L.category)) else ($L.all.cats=false) To: if (avail.cond in $L.category=NULL or evaluate(avail.cond in $L.category) and (lng(denull(request.phases in $L.category))=0 or index(name in $L.parent.phase, request.phases in $L.category)>0)) then ($L.allowed.cats=insert($L.allowed.cats, 0, 1, name in $L.category)) else ($L.all.cats=false) Panel: setup.category.sql Change: Changed the following expression from: if (not $L.all.cats) then ($L.cat.sql="name isin "+str($L.allowed.cats)) To: $L.all.cats=nullsub($L.all.cats, false) if (not nullsub($L.all.cats, false)) then ($L.cat.sql="name isin "+str(nullsub($L.allowed.cats, "{}"))) Panel: start Change: Added the following expression: $L.no.category.msg=scmsg(364, "cm3") $L.bg=nullsub($INTO.BG, false)
